alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 8:59PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Idaho County through 830 PM PDT... At 757 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles south of Lowell, or 31 miles east of Grangeville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Red River Hot Spring and Orogrande. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is possible with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
